comment.author: 25100796@N08
comment._content: The combination of the Garand and the dishpan helmet puts this photo in 1940 (unlikely), 1941 (most likely) or 1942 (unlikely).  The Garand debuted in the late 1930s and some Army infantry regiments were fully equipped with it by 1940.  The M1 Helmet, on the other hand, did not enter service until 1941.  Photos show some Army units embarking for overseas (Iceland?) with the old dishpans.
